definition: animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to miss/to shoot and miss the target/off the mark
chest silhouette (used as a target in shooting practice)
(dialect) to do a body search/to frisk

sentences.english: If you would hit the mark, you must aim a little above it.
sentences.chinese: 要向射靶，必需瞄准比靶稍微高些。

sentences.english: The amount of power that can be dissipated in a thin target is limited .
sentences.chinese: 薄靶中所可能散逸的功率是有限的。

sentences.english: Research on optoelectronic characteristic of home-made si vidicon is carried out.
sentences.chinese: 对国产硅靶摄象管的光电特性进行了研究测试。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to regulate activity of target RNA oligonucleotides.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及用于调节靶RNA活性的寡核苷酸。

sentences.english: Equally important to the ballistic range tests is the design of model and sabot .
sentences.chinese: 模型及弹托设计是开展弹道靶试验研究的基础。

sentences.english: Accelerated beams of deuterons bombarding a target will not work.
sentences.chinese: 用加速的氘核来打击靶将不起作用。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the killing effect of the "Rodent target", a biochemical rodenticide.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解“鼠靶”生化灭鼠剂现场灭鼠效果。

sentences.english: Lung is the mainly involved targeting organ of multiple organ dysfunction syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 肺是多器官功能障碍综合征最主要的靶器官。

sentences.english: The heart and vessels are target organs of relaxin.
sentences.chinese: 心脏和血管是松弛素的靶器官。

sentences.english: Large spontaneous magnetic field is produced during the interaction of ultra-short and ultra-intense laser with solids.
sentences.chinese: 超短超强激光与固体靶相互作用产生强的自生磁场。

sentences.english: Target joints can be regarded as better predictors of the prognosis of the joints with lesions.
sentences.chinese: 靶关节可以作为判断发生病变骨关节预后的较好指标。

sentences.english: Multi-layered space plates of aluminum alloy penetrated by a tungsten sphere is experimentally investigated.
sentences.chinese: 进行了钨合金球侵彻多层等间隔硬铝靶的实验研究。

sentences.english: Moreover Deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) is the primary target molecule for most of anticancer dnig.
sentences.chinese: 另外，DNA是许多抗癌药物作用的首要靶分子。

sentences.english: I will shoot three arrows to the side of it, as though I were shooting at a target.
sentences.chinese: 我要向磐石旁边射三箭，如同射箭靶一样。

sentences.english: But primates were not the only targets for borna viruses.
sentences.chinese: 但是灵长类并非博纳病毒的唯一靶宿主。

definition: to miss/to shoot and miss the target/off the mark
variant of 標槍|标枪[biao1 qiang1]
